divs: Sighting Detailsas veiwing the eclipce with many others between the hours of 930pm and 1200am onthe way home walking along the lake shore path aprox 11pm ish possibly sw cornerof the lake above an island a light was hovering for aprox 5-7mins from timenoticed asked what could be was there a tower with a beacon above answer no.light began to move then realized was not a beacon was definetly a plane orhelicoptor flying object moving .thought could be a helicoptor or plane as usualmaybe a air ambulance due to the amount of light from the object,object movedtoward us closer appeared to be a search light emitted on the lake like a searchand rescue possibly then object flew by slowly as though it had to be ahelicoptor object had no sound no wind was no more than 500 feet up the lightswere multicoloured some were lit thenn not there seemed to be something calmingabout the on off blinking patters emitted from lights thought maybe it was a airambulance with all light on and lights inside on aswell object then continued tofly past somewhat slow flew toward the city .based on direction there is no airstrip in the direction of flight but did seem to fly either into the city orrapidly over ....object was definetly seen by others on the board walk hadpeople on it cars were driving on roads and there was a large gathering ofpeople at the beach for the public eclipce viewing the sighting of the objecttook place when we left the public viewing at the beach .note the flight actionof the object were oddly smooth and clean .strange and weird to see somethingthat might be a helicoptor or plane but reason says that if it was eitherpatterns of flight behaviour lights all seemed unique
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in North Bay
There were no other sightings in North Bay on or around May 15th 2003
